description: Numbers that are congruent to {5, 7} mod 8.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 1, -1).
formula: a(n) = 8*n-a(n-1)-4 (with a(1)=5). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 06 2010a(n) = 4*n-(-1)^n. - _Rolf Pleisch_, Nov 02 2010a(1)=5, a(2)=7, a(3)=13; for n>3, a(n) = a(n-1)+a(n-2)-a(n-3). - _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 04 2012
mathematica: With[{r8=8*Range[0,40]},Sort[Join[r8+5,r8+7]]] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[ {1,1,-1},{5,7,13},80] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 04 2012 *)Table[4 n - (-1)^n, {n, 100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Mar 31 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
